byline.original: By HARI KUMAR and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Young woman traveling in Indian state Punjab dies from head injury after she and her mother were molested and thrown from private bus; police arrest driver, conductor and two other employees of bus company, owned in part by family of Punjab's Chief Min Parkash Singh Badal.
lead_paragraph: Four men were arrested on Thursday in connection with the case, in which the young woman, who was traveling with her mother, sustained a head injury, according to the police.

headline.main: Woman in Punjab Is Killed After Being Molested on Bus
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: Woman Dies After Attack on Bus

snippet: Four men were arrested on Thursday in connection with the case, in which the young woman, who was traveling with her mother, sustained a head injury, according to the police.
